articles.author: Joel Khalili
articles.title: Why Crypto Idealogues Won’t Touch Bitcoin ETFs
articles.description: The arrival of spot bitcoin ETFs in the US offers easy access to the masses. Purists will steer clear.
articles.content: Bitcoin devotees are declaring a historic victory after US regulators approved a new, more accessible way for people to invest in the crypto asset after a decade of resistance. Yet they wont go anywh… [+3062 chars]

articles.author: Elizabeth Lopatto
articles.title: How to sue a hacker using Bitcoin
articles.description: Ryan Dellone served notice of a lawsuit to an unknown hacker via a Bitcoin transaction. It’s the first of its kind — and is unlikely to be the last.

articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: The SEC’s X account was hijacked to post a fake approval of Bitcoin ETFs
articles.description: The official SEC account posted a false notice claiming the agency has approved Bitcoin ETFs. SEC Chair Gary Gensler confirmed the agency’s account had been compromised.
